channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gmail’s New Encrypted Messages Feature Opens a Door for Scams
item.description: Google is rolling out an end-to-end encrypted email feature for business customers, but it could spawn phishing attacks, particularly in non-Gmail inb...

item.title: RepAir Carbon is making carbon removal machines inspired by batteries
item.description: RepAir recently raised a $15 million extension to its Series A.

item.title: Spotify’s AI playlist rolls out to Asia and more markets
item.description: Spotify announced on Thursday that it expanded the availability of its AI Playlist feature to over 40 additional markets, including countries in Afric...

item.title: TikTok adds support for ALT text for photos
item.description: TikTok is rolling out support for ALT text for photo posts to make content more accessible for users with visual and cognitive impairments. The compan...

item.title: The Best Motorola Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Motorola phones may seem old-school, but their reasonable prices, colorful designs, and simple software make them good, wallet-friendly Android smartp...

item.title: 20 Great Gifts for Mom: Ideas for the Best Mother (2025)
item.description: There are many kinds of mothers, but these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

item.title: 20 Best Gifts for Women Who Are Over This Reality (2025)
item.description: She’s seen enough. She’s had enough. She can’t fly through a portal to a different reality, but these gifts will help her transcend this world.

item.title: Anthropic is launching a new program to study AI ‘model welfare’

item.title: Motorola's Latest Razr Phones Are All In on AI
item.description: Perplexity? Gemini? Copilot? The Razr Ultra will have it all optimized for its flippy, folding screen.
